subject: Моля за баланс към 31,12,24 с Lila Kagit
attachmentsData:
TIBIEL Ltd
Dear Sir / Madam,
DRT Bağımsız Denetim ve Serbest Muhasebeci Mali Müşavirlik A.Ş. (member of Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Limited) has been
assigned as independent auditors for the year ended 31 December 2024. In connection with the reconciliation of our current
accounts we would be grateful if you could provide the following information;
I A statement of balances with us as at 31 December 2024
2 A statement of all open items making up the balances as at 31 December 2024
3 A statement of total purchases/sales from/to us for the period between | January-31 December 2024
Please send your reply via email, as a signed PDF and by e-mail and/or facsimile, to the following address of our independent
auditors DRT Bağımsız Denetim ve Serbest Muhasebeci Mali Müşavirlik A.Ş. (member of Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Limited) at
the following address:
Deloitte Values House
Maslak No!
34398 İstanbul, Türkiye
Tel
: +90 (212) 366 60 00
Fax
: +90 (212) 366 61 76
Contact person : Atak Tonya
Email address
: atonya@deloitte.com
An early response would be appreciated
Thank you very much for your co-operation,
Yours faithfully.
LİLA KAĞIT SAN. VE TIC. A.Ş.
Authorized Signature - Official Stamp of the Company - Date
LİLA KAĞIT SAN. ve TİC. A.Ş.
34)
Merdivenkoy Mahallesi Nur Sokak
